scripts.delete: cd mongo & cd schema & mongosh --file delete_collections.js
scripts.import: cd mongo & cd schema & mongoimport --db COSE-Preparedness-Map --collection cose-maps  --type json --file cose-maps.json & mongoimport --db COSE-Preparedness-Map --collection cose-skills --type json --jsonArray --file cose-skills.json & mongoimport --db COSE-Preparedness-Map --collection cose-types  --type json --jsonArray --file cose-types.json
